about_the_game:
This music pack allows you to use music from SENRAN KAGURA Estival Versus in SENRAN KAGURA Peach Ball.

At the Stage Select screen on Story Mode or Free Mode, use the "BGM" option to change the gameplay music.

Tracklist:
1. Candy Theme Park
2. Just a Biiiiiit
3. Place that Fiery Hope in Your Heart
4. Hot Snowscape
5. Festival Resounds in the Mountains
6. Passioinate Beach!
7. Sound Off! The Beating Soul
8. Get Hot!
9. Sayuri's Whim
10. Red Hot KAZAN
11. Light and Silence
12. Nice of You to Come! Hebijo!
13. Grandma's True Intentions
14. Bean Sprouts and My Seafood
15. Grandfather's Wish
16. Indigo Murasaki's True Feelings
17. Hurt Me Really, REALLY Bad

At the Stage Select screen on Story Mode or Free Mode, use the "BGM" option to change the gameplay music.
